enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: PROGRESS REPORTS BY THE CHAIRS OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES
sentences: SBI Chair Ashe said the SBI had considered all its agenda items and completed consideration of a number of these.

He drew attention to areas requiring further work, including: proposals to amend the list in UNFCCC Annexes I and II; arrangements for intergovernmental meetings; matters relating to LDCs; the CGE; and possible options to respond to late payment of contributions.
He indicated that consultations on these matters are ongoing. SBSTA Chair Dovland informed delegates that SBSTA was holding informal consultations to prepare conclusions on several items.
He reported that no major problems had been encountered, and hoped that work on outstanding items would be completed soon.
